name: The Calling (journey_1527)
description: This is an RPG horror puzzle game running in the browser. As a novice detective, the player goes to the abandoned hospital by the sea. Seemingly as detecting the case, in fact, there is a dark line task at the same time. The player obtains clues and hints by picking up items. They are intertwined, solve the case on the surface, find hidden clues, complete the real task, and at the same time need to use the correct method to hide the monsters to survive. There are three endings in this game. As clues are discovered, the detective's vision and speed will change, giving players more opportunities and experiences to explore, leading to different endings.
